mapper.select: SELECT QS.ID , QS.QUERY FROM QUERYSTORE QS ORDER BY ID ASC
SELECT QS.* FROM QUERYSTORE QS WHERE UPPER(QS.ID) = UPPER(#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM QUERYSTORE WHERE UPPER(ID) = UPPER(#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUERYREVISION ( REVISION , ID , QUERY , REVISIONNOTE , MODIFIED , UPDATER ) SELECT QS.REVISION , QS.ID , QS.QUERY , CAST(#{revisionNote, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS VARCHAR(512)) AS REVISIONNOTE , QS.MODIFIED , QS.UPDATER FROM QUERYSTORE QS WHERE UPPER(QS.ID) = UPPER(#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
